description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. In this fast paced game you guide a worm in his eternal journey full of hazards through various stages of his life. Use the solo, co-op or the versus-mode to accomplish this. Eat digestible goodies to grow as you go. Avoid the once that might harm or kill you. If you consume enough Cola you can burp away annoying obstacles. This is great fun when played with your partner!
